name: Deadpool
description: A former Special Forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopting the alter ego Deadpool.

name: We're the Millers
description: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.

name: Straight Outta Compton
description: The group N.W.A emerges from the mean streets of Compton in Los Angeles during the mid-1980s and revolutionizes hip-hop culture.

name: Gridiron Gang
description: Teenagers at a juvenile detention center gain self-esteem by playing football together under the leadership of their counselor.

name: American Gangster
description: A detective works to bring down the drug empire of Frank Lucas, a heroin kingpin in 1970s America.

name: Gangster Squad
description: A team of cops in 1949 Los Angeles assembles to take down ruthless mobster Mickey Cohen.

name: Now You See Me
description: An FBI agent tracks illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances.

name: Jurassic World
description: A new dinosaur theme park spirals out of control when a genetically modified predator escapes.

name: Mission: Impossible – Rogue Nation
description: Ethan Hunt and his team take on the rogue Syndicate threatening the IMF.

name: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
description: CIA and KGB agents team up to stop a mysterious criminal organization during the Cold War.

name: Spectre
description: James Bond uncovers the sinister organization behind multiple global threats.

name: Legend
description: The true story of the Kray twins and their organized crime empire in 1960s London.

name: Southpaw
description: A boxer fights to reclaim his life and career after personal tragedy.

name: Bridge of Spies
description: An American lawyer negotiates a Cold War prisoner exchange between the U.S. and the Soviet Union.

name: Ant-Man
description: A thief with a shrinking suit must pull off a high-stakes heist to save the world.

name: Fast & Furious 7
description: Dominic Toretto and his crew face a revenge-driven assassin.

name: Tracers
description: A bike messenger gets pulled into the dangerous world of parkour and organized crime.

name: Running Scared
description: A low-level mobster must recover a gun before it causes more chaos.

name: The Hangover
description: Three friends retrace their steps after a wild bachelor party in Las Vegas.

name: Project X
description: A high school party spirals wildly out of control.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind bent on chaos.

name: The Tournament
description: Thirty assassins enter a deadly battle royale for a massive cash prize.

name: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the true nature of reality and his role in humanity’s rebellion.

name: Bad Boys
description: Two detectives protect a witness while investigating a stolen heroin case.
